post.title: 1M Summer Event 2023 - CSGORoll
post.excerpt: While summer is well underway, the fun is just beginning at CSGORoll. The so anticipated 1 MILLION GIVEAWAY has arrived as we promised, and we're thrilled to share that a fantastic experience awaits you. Take a look at all the amazing things we've
post.content_html:
While summer is well underway, the fun is just beginning at CSGORoll. The so anticipated 1 MILLION GIVEAWAY has arrived as we promised, and we're thrilled to share that a fantastic experience awaits you. Take a look at all the amazing things we've prepared for you between August 18th and September 17th, 2023.

500k Jackpot

You don't wanna miss out on this one! Gather your entries by utilizing the Coconuts you acquire while playing any of our games. Each Coconut used to open our Coconut cases will grant you an equivalent number of tickets for the Summer Jackpot event. So, be sure to collect as many as you can and use them all before the countdown is over for each week's jackpot.

Here's the breakdown for each week:

  • Week 1: 75k - Aug 27th at 7 pm CET
  • Week 2: 125k - Sept 3rd at 7 pm CET
  • Week 3: 150k - Sept 10th at 7 pm CET
  • Week 4: 200k - Sept 17th at 7 pm CET

By using your Coconuts, you're automatically entered, and winners will be chosen during a live stream on our Twitch and Kick channels.

Coconut Leaderboard

A total of 150k coins will be given away split between two leaderboards. The first one hosted between Aug 20th and Sept 3rd and the second from Sept 3rd until 17th, at 8 pm CET.

Those who excel at collecting the most Coconuts throughout the event period will not only enhance their ticket count but will also receive coins for their dedication and time invested in collecting Coconuts! Here's how the rewards will be distributed among the top 10 participants:

  1. 37,500 coins
  2. 16,875 coins
  3. 9,375 coins
  4. 4,500 coins
  5. 2,625 coins
  6. 1,875 coins
  7. 1,125 coins
  8. 562.5 coins
  9. 375 coins
  10. 187.5 coins

CSGORoll Tournament

How's your CS:GO aim? You better start practicing because our beloved "Community vs Staff" games have been elevated to new heights with a 100k coins prize pool this time. Join us live to witness 16 teams consisting of community-selected players and staff members battling it out in an exciting 5v5 CS:GO matches, all aiming for the ultimate prize in our CS:GO Summer tournament!

To get involved, simply express your interest by participating in one of our open polls taking place from the 17th to the 20th of August, register your interest now . Our team will handpick a group of participants and reach out to them for additional details to form the teams. So, it's essential to ensure you have a valid email listed in your CSGORoll profile and that you're available throughout all the scheduled game dates. Your active participation could lead to an unforgettable experience with our community and staff!

All the games are hosted on Faceit, so you can prepare in advance by registering your account , downloading the client , and installing the Anti-Cheat System .

  • Week 1: Knockout: 1st Knockout Aug 26th & 2nd Knockout Aug 27th
  • Week 2: Quarterfinals: Sat 2nd & Sunday Sept 3rd
  • Week 3: Semi-Finals: Sunday, Sept 10th
  • Week 4: Grand Final: Sunday, Sept 17th

Special Golden Coconuts

You don't wanna miss out on these shiny little things. Unique cases will be available for those who manage to collect Golden Coconuts during the event duration.

You may win Golden Coconuts from:

  • Weekly Jackpot prizes;
  • Rare Golden Coconut drop parties in the chat;
  • Giveaways during our weekly live streams.

Make sure to follow our Twitter , join the Discord server and our streaming channels on Twitch and Kick not to lose any drop!

The entire CSGORoll team is absolutely thrilled to present this amazing event to you once more. We've poured our hearts into making sure we not only meet but exceed all the expectations we set during the last event . The hard work has truly paid off as we've brought numerous enhancements to the table, and we're genuinely excited about you getting to experience them, our aim is to continue improving as always and we promise to continue delivering updates for you. Your satisfaction is what drives us, and we're sincerely hopeful that these improvements will add to your enjoyment and experience when using CSGORoll.

This event holds special significance for us, as it's a way for us to express our gratitude to the incredible community that has stood by us for more than seven years, through the ups and downs. Your unwavering support has not only motivated us but has also played an instrumental role in shaping CSGORoll into the best version of itself. Here's to many more years of fun, events, and memorable moments together. Thank you for being an integral part of our journey!
